Articles.Content:
Spoiler

KotH/persistent.sfs

Users dead in fictional universe = Fraston TheMinmusDerp

Hill Ownership = HansonKerman

Hill is mine due to hill being mine according to the fictional universe.
I erase you from the space time continuum. My hill.
The hill has disappeared due to the caused space-time continuum instability.
haha LOL that never happens. My hill.

Yes, that never happens.  

The whole timeline disappeared from history.

Nobody knows about somebody possessing the hill.

Sorry, [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/), you've received a [VAC ban](https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=7849-Radz-6869).

Nobody is the king of the hill because I've decided to set up a republic and abolish the monarchy.
I don’t use steam. My hill.

An unexpected steam stream <sub>no, literally!</sub> boils you. (You don't use steam, so failed to protect).

A hot hill.

> 
>

> 
> 
> I erase you from the space time continuum. My hill.
> 

But... <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">you're dead?</font>

So wut?  

Spoiler

![ghost-03.png](https://thevictorvoice.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/ghost-03.png)
I change time and make myself not dead. I erase [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) from the spacetime continuum. My hill
Okay, that works.

> 
> 
> Just now, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> Okay, that works.
> 

How can you post here? You are not a god and are erased from the spacetime continuum. this doesn't make sense.

Spoiler

The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-14T14:30:24Z" title="07/14/2018 02:30  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 14, 2018</time> by The Minmus Derp**
After the hill defense system made a pretender to redact his claims and reduce his appetite, the hill is now independent.

I corrupt every one of your brain cells. i build a new hill on a slime island.

my tinker's construct slimy hill.
A slime golem appears from the bog and occupies th island.
I make a hill on Taythe. My hill with pretty views.

I move to Minmus. My moon.
